alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 10 at 5:06AM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 possible below 4000 feet with up to 6 inches possible above 4000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions and travel delays. Periods of reduced visibility due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
